title: Strengthening Machine Learning Practical Competencies: Generative AI-Integrated Instructional Design Capability Enhancement for Science Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can apply self-directed problem-solving strategies in over 80% of situations during interactions with generative AI.
Learners can understand the differences between expert bots and ChatGPT and explain at least three criteria for selecting tools aligned with instructional design goals.
Learners can execute a three-stage instructional design process (learning objective design, activity development, assessment tool creation) based on PBL projects in AI-supported environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
